subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The University of Southern California’s hiring of Lane Kiffin, who left Tennessee after a tenure marked by violations and an investigation, is being widely viewed as a thumb in the eye of the N.C.A.A.
snippet: The University of Southern California’s hiring of Lane Kiffin, who left Tennessee after a tenure marked by violations and an investigation, is being widely viewed as a thumb in the eye of the N.C.A.A.
